File Conversion

Convert files directly in your browser without uploading to any server.

Select Conversion Type

Upload File

Conversion Result

Upload a file and select conversion options to see results here.

Supported File Formats

Image Formats

  • PNG ↔ JPG/JPEG
  • PNG/JPG ↔ WebP
  • PNG/JPG ↔ GIF
  • PNG/JPG ↔ SVG
  • PNG/JPG ↔ ICO
  • PNG/JPG ↔ TIFF
  • PNG/JPG ↔ BMP

Document Formats

  • PDF ↔ DOCX
  • PDF ↔ TXT
  • PDF ↔ HTML
  • PDF ↔ PPTX
  • DOCX ↔ TXT
  • DOCX ↔ HTML
  • PDF ↔ Images (PNG, JPG)

Audio Formats

  • MP3 ↔ WAV
  • MP3 ↔ OGG
  • MP3 ↔ AAC
  • MP3 ↔ FLAC
  • MP3 ↔ M4A
  • WAV ↔ FLAC
  • OGG ↔ AAC

Data Formats

  • CSV ↔ JSON
  • CSV ↔ XML
  • CSV ↔ XLSX
  • JSON ↔ XML
  • JSON ↔ YAML
  • XML ↔ YAML
  • HTML ↔ Markdown

Why Our Conversion Process is Secure

Browser-Based Processing

All file conversions happen in your browser, so files are never uploaded to any external servers. This enhances your privacy.

Security Technology

We use the latest web security technologies and encryption to safely process your data. We ensure the integrity of your files.

Transparency

All conversion processes take place on your device, making the process transparent and easy to verify.

FileToQR

Convert files and generate QR codes directly in your browser without uploading to any server.
